abstract_ssm: This collection contains the records of the United Progressive Democratic Club of the 47th Assembly District in Brooklyn, N.Y. The collection material dates from 1930 to 2004, tracing the club through name changes and the re-numbering of its district, and documents the Club's activities and interests.  Materials include meeting announcements and minutes, correspondence of Club chairmen, and yearbooks of the Club's annual dinners and dances.
